plugin.name: TEST
plugin.description:
This is just a test plugin. Invoke it passing the String you want to get back and, optionally, the status you want. Return: If you don't specify the status parameters, the return code is 'OK'. The returned message is always the text you pass as parameter (-t/--text)
Example Command Definition (inside the server configuration, in the command section)
check_test : TEST --text $ARG1$ --status $ARG2$
or, using the XML:
<command name="test" plugin_name="TEST"> <arg name="text" value="$ARG1$"/> <arg name="status" value="$ARG2$"/> </command>
Example invocation:
./check_nrpe -n -H myjnrpeserver -c check_test -a 'Hello!critical'

option.description: the status to return (ok, warning, critical, unknown)
